C

Client - Class in model
Model class for the Client table in the database, used to store information about a client
Client() - Constructor for class model.Client
basic constructor
Client(int, String, String, int) - Constructor for class model.Client
constructor containing all the necessary fields
Client(String, String, int) - Constructor for class model.Client
constructor containing the all the fields, except for the id, in case the id field is set on auto-increment
ClientBLL - Class in bll
Business Logic class for the Client table, implementing methods used to further enhance the usage of the SQL queries
ClientBLL() - Constructor for class bll.ClientBLL
 
ClientDAO - Class in dao
Data Access class for the Client table, implementing the operations available on the database: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE
ClientDAO() - Constructor for class dao.ClientDAO
 
close(Connection) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
method used to close the connection between the program and the database can generate an SQLException
close(Statement) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
method used to close the statement when executing a query on the database can generate an SQLException
close(ResultSet) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
method used to close the resultSet when executing a SELECT query can generate an SQLException
Command - Enum in utils
Enumeration containing all the operations accepted as input from the input file
CommandText - Class in utils
Utility class used to store all the necessary information about a command received as input from the input file
CommandText() - Constructor for class utils.CommandText
basic constructor
CommandText(Command, String) - Constructor for class utils.CommandText
constructor containing only the command and the table, in case the command doesn't require a text field
CommandText(Command, String, String) - Constructor for class utils.CommandText
constructor containing all the fields
connection - package connection
 
ConnectionFactory - Class in connection
Connection class, implementing the methods necessary to begin / end the connection with a given database
Controller - Class in presentation
Presentation class used to generate the requested PDFs
Controller() - Constructor for class presentation.Controller
 
createDeleteQuery(T) - Method in class dao.AbstractDAO
method to create the DELETE query for the database, based on a specified object
createInsertQuery(T) - Method in class dao.AbstractDAO
method to create the INSERT query for the database, based on a specified object
createObjects(ResultSet) - Method in class dao.AbstractDAO
method which transforms a given ResultSet into the corresponding list of objects
createSelectQuery(String) - Method in class dao.AbstractDAO
method to create the SELECT query for the database, based on a specified field
createUpdateQuery(T) - Method in class dao.AbstractDAO
method to create the UPDATE query for the database, based on a specified object
